metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29827 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** ejs v3.1.9 is vulnerable to server-side template injection. If the ejs file is controllable, template injection can be implemented through the configuration settings of the closeDelimiter parameter. NOTE: this is disputed by the vendor because the render function is not intended to be used with untrusted input.

criterions.comment: node-ejs package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
